name: Delicious BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. The crackling flames and sizzling sounds herald an imminent feast, igniting your craving for that first bite. The firmness of the thick hunks of meat and the abundance of savory juices that burst forth with every bite perfectly complement one another in a culinary experience that might be called bathing in BBQ bliss.

customize.name: Recipe: BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making BBQ Beef Heart Skewers.

customize.name: BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
customize.desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. Marinated beef heart is threaded onto skewers before being barbequed over charcoal, grilling forth an enticing aroma and captivating luster. Add on a bit of grilled grainfruit and potato, and you've assembled the eternal golden ensemble of Natlan's street food scene!

customize.name: Suspicious BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
customize.desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. The fire blazed out of control, burning the outside to charcoal in an instant, while inside, the meat is still half raw. Maybe you can cut off the burnt bits and put the rest back over the charcoal, and try grilling it again, but over a smaller flame this time...

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.
